verses.text: Now the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* gathered \w together|strong="H6908"\w* all their \w armies|strong="H4264"\w* to \w Aphek|strong="H0663"\w*: and the \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* by a \w fountain|strong="H5869"\w* which \add is\add* in \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.

And the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* passed \w on|strong="H5674"\w* by \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, and by \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*: but \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* passed \w on|strong="H5674"\w* in the \w rereward|strong="H0314"\w* with \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, What \add do\add* these \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w* \add here\add*? And \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \add Is\add* not this \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which hath been with me these \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, or these \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, and I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* no \w fault|strong="H3972"\w* in him \w since|strong="H3117"\w* he \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \add unto me\add* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*?

And the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* were \w wroth|strong="H7107"\w* with him; and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Make|strong="H7725"\w* this \w fellow|strong="H0376"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, that he may go \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to his \w place|strong="H4725"\w* which thou hast \w appointed|strong="H6485"\w* him, and let him not go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with us to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, lest in the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* he be an \w adversary|strong="H7854"\w* to us: for wherewith should he \w reconcile|strong="H7521"\w* himself unto his \w master|strong="H0113"\w*? \add should it\add* not \add be\add* with the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of these \w men|strong="H0582"\w*?

\add Is\add* not this \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, of whom they \w sang|strong="H6030"\w* one to another in \w dances|strong="H4246"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* his \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w*, and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his ten \w thousands|strong="H7233"\w*?

¶ Then \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Surely, \add as\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w liveth|strong="H2416"\w*, thou hast been \w upright|strong="H3477"\w*, and thy going \w out|strong="H3318"\w* and thy coming \w in|strong="H0935"\w* with me in the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* \add is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*: for I have not \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in thee since the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* unto me unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: nevertheless the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* \w favour|strong="H2896"\w* thee \w not|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 29.6 \ft the lords…: Heb. thou art not good in the eyes of the lords\f*

Wherefore now \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w* in \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, that thou \w displease|strong="H6213"\w* not the \w lords|strong="H5633"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*.\f + \fr 29.7 \ft displease…: Heb. do not evil in the eyes of the lords\f*

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w*, But what have I \w done|strong="H6213"\w*? and what hast thou \w found|strong="H4672"\w* in thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* so long \w as|strong="H3117"\w* I have been with \w thee|strong="H6440"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that I may not \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* of my \w lord|strong="H0113"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?\f + \fr 29.8 \ft with…: Heb. before thee\f*

And \w Achish|strong="H0397"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that thou \add art\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, as an \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: notwithstanding the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* have \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, He shall not go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* with us to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.

Wherefore now rise up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* with thy \w master’s|strong="H0113"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* that are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* with thee: and as soon as ye be up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and have \w light|strong="H0215"\w*, \w depart|strong="H3212"\w*.

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* rose up \w early|strong="H7925"\w* to \w depart|strong="H3212"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, to \w return|strong="H7725"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*. And the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.
